SimpleAtom(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a SimpleAtom which runs the given script and places any ElementReference as the first argument to the script.

handleNoElementReference().Description: Extend this method to handle the case where getArguments() has been called without an ElementReference. Implementors may want to throw an exception here if they require an ElementReference to evaluate properly.

getNonContextualArguments().Description: Extend this method to pass additional arguments to the script.

getScript().Description: Returns the script this SimpleAtom was created with.

ClassDesc: A simple implementation of Atom suitable for subclassing.
